author: conor
msg: Catch NoClassDefFoundErrors. These indicate that while a superclass is available
on the classpath, a class it depends on is not. As this code is currently catching
ClassNotFound exceptions anyway, this is not a major change. It will log a

author: bodewig
msg: Forgot to add a testcase for replace.

author: bodewig
msg: And token attribute of <replacefilter> must not be empty either.

author: bodewig
msg: Add some sanity checks. If we allow an empty token, we end up in an
endless loop - as demonstrated by unittest test4.

author: bodewig
msg: Changed the handling of build.sysclasspath so that Ant should behave
the same way as Ant 1.2 did - if build.sysclasspath has not been set.
